mahindata eda ara chandrika namathi gani hathurukam karala wipaksha nayaka kama nodi inna bariwune mahindata thibunu shakthiya nisa neda ?agamathi kama denna uneth enisa neda ?janapathi kamata namayojana denna uneth mahinda shakthimath nayakayek nisa neda ?dan hithaganna puluwanda sajith monatharam durwala kenekda kiyala .?hamadama nahen ada ada ranilta paradinawa hariyata podi lamayek thaththagen bayisikalaya illala labenne nathiwa innawa wage ?sajithta ba baya nathuwa ranil abiyoga karala baya nathi thiranayak ganna .sajith kiyanne bayagullek minihata oona shep eke hama deyakata athata genath denakam inna thirana aragena hala happila dinanna minihata shakthiyak na.prashna aawama miniha karanne panala yana eka ehewu minihekta ratak denna minissu modayi kiyala hithuwada ?

1966 warshayedi jingal githaya grika,ithali,rusiyanu ha yugoslewiyanu bhasha walin patigatha kala athara oostreliyawe janawargika kandayam[11] .[2]ilakka kotagena karana lada prathama welanda pracharana wyaparaya da wiya.jingal githaye sanskaranayan andaෲs sahodariyan saha wiktar borj[2] wisin patigatha karana ladi.1940 kala wakawanuwe mul bhagayedi dinakata 100 warakata adhika pramanayak guwanwiduliya osse pracharanaya kerunu athara oostreliyawe[2] digukalak janapriya wu githayak bawatada pathwiya.anathuruwa 2003 warshayedi mbaawunge 75 wana sanwathsara samarumath samangama starlayit lama aramudalata aadhara pinisa jathika mattame tharangagawaliyak sanwidhanaya karana ladi.[12]

pasugiya wasare me tharagawaliye shurayan lesa santha pithara widuhala abhisheka labu athara kolambaa rajakiya widuhala anushurathawa dina gaththeya.me tharagawaliye dewani kotase tharagawaliya sapthambar masa 1saha 2wanida nawalapitiye di pawathwe.tharagawaliyata sahabhagiwana kandayam meseya.'ee' kandaya- santha pithara, galkisse santha thomas, maliyadewa, 'bi' kandaya- kingswud, dharmaraja, aananda, 'si' kandaya- santha joshap, silwesthara, panadura rajakiya, 'di' kandaya- isipathana, di.es., lumbini,'ee' kandaya- widya widyalaya, tharstan, nalanda, 'ef' kandaya- widyartha, wesli, mathale santha thomas, 'ji' kandaya- thrithwa, mahanama, si.dab.dab.kannangara, 'ech' kandaya- rajakiya, santha anthoni, wels kumara, dharmapala.
